00044 void UBlasExtras::randomize(Matrix& m, double maxRand) {
00045 
00046     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m.size1(); i++) {
00047         for (unsigned int j = 0; j < m.size2(); j++) {
00048             m(i,j) = ((random()/(double)RAND_MAX) - 0.5)*2*maxRand;
00049         }
00050     }
00051     
00052 }

00062 void UBlasExtras::invertMatrix(const Matrix& input, Matrix& inverse) {
00063     
00064     typedef permutation_matrix<std::size_t> pmatrix;
00065      // create a working copy of the input
00066      Matrix A(input);
00067      // create a permutation matrix for the LU-factorization
00068      pmatrix pm(A.size1());
00069      
00070      // perform LU-factorization
00071      lu_factorize(A,pm);
00072      
00073      // create identity matrix of "inverse"
00074      inverse.assign(identity_matrix<double>(A.size1()));
00075      
00076      // backsubstitute to get the inverse
00077      lu_substitute(A, pm, inverse);
00078  }
00079

00088 void UBlasExtras::solveLinear(Matrix& A, Vector& b, Vector& x) {
00089 
00090     typedef permutation_matrix<std::size_t> pmatrix;
00091     // create a working copy of the input
00092     Matrix input(A);
00093     // create a permutation matrix for the LU-factorization
00094     pmatrix pm(A.size1());
00095     
00096     // perform LU-factorization
00097     lu_factorize(input,pm);
00098     x = b;
00099     lu_substitute(input, pm, x);
00100 }
00101

00111 void UBlasExtras::updateInverseMatrix(Matrix& inverse, Vector& c, Vector& d) {
00112 
00113     Vector a(c.size());
00114     a.clear();
00115     Vector b(d.size());
00116     b.clear();
00117     axpy_prod(inverse,c,a,true);
00118     axpy_prod(d,inverse,b,true);
00119     inverse = inverse - outer_prod(a,b)/(1.0 + inner_prod(b,c));
00120     
00121 }

00132 void UBlasExtras::addMatrixToVector(Matrix& m, Vector& v, int s) {
00133 
00134      assert(m.size1()*m.size2() <= v.size());
00135      
00136      for (size_t j=0; j<m.size2(); j++) {
00137          project(v, range(j*m.size1() + s, (j+1)*m.size1() + s)) += column(m, j);
00138      }
00139 
00140  }
00141 
00142 
00152 void UBlasExtras::addScaledVectorToMatrix(double scale, Vector& v, Matrix& m, int s) {
00153 
00154      assert(m.size1()*m.size2() <= v.size());
00155      
00156      for (size_t j=0; j<m.size2(); j++) {
00157          column(m, j) +=  scale*project(v, range(j*m.size1() + s, (j+1)*m.size1() + s));
00158      }
00159 
00160  }

00168 double UBlasExtras::angle(Vector& v1, Vector& v2) {
00169 
00170     return acos(inner_prod(v1, v2)/(norm_2(v1)*norm_2(v2)));
00171 
00172 }

00179 bool UBlasExtras::containsNaN(Vector& v) {
00180     for (size_t i = 0; i < v.size(); i++) if (isnan(v[i])) return true;
00181     return false;
00182 }

00184 
00189 bool UBlasExtras::containsNaN(Matrix& m) {
00190     for (size_t i = 0; i < m.size1(); i++) {
00191         for (size_t j = 0; j < m.size2(); j++) {
00192             if (isnan(m(i,j))) return true;
00193         }
00194     }
00195     return false;
00196 }

00206 void UBlasExtras::linearLeastSquares(Matrix& A, Vector& y, Vector& x) {
00207 
00208     Matrix sqrA(A.size2(), A.size2());
00209     Vector trAy(x.size()); 
00210 
00211     // Symmetry optimised rank k update.
00212     noalias(sqrA) = prod(trans(A), A);
00213 
00214     //cout<<"sqrA:"<<sqrA<<endl;
00215 
00216     noalias(trAy) = prod(trans(A), y);
00217     //cout<<"trAy:"<<trAy<<endl;
00218 
00219 #if (HAVE_BOOST_SANDBOX && HAVE_ATLAS) 
00220     solveLinearCholesky(sqrA, trAy, x);
00221 #else
00222     solveLinear(sqrA, trAy, x);
00223 #endif
00224 
00225 
00226 }

00229 void UBlasExtras::linearLeastSquares_test() {
00230 
00231     Matrix A(2,2);
00232     A.clear();
00233     A(0,0) = 1.0;
00234     A(1,1) = 1.0;
00235 
00236     Vector b(2);
00237     b[0] = 1.0;
00238     b[1] = 1.0;
00239 
00240     Vector x(2);
00241     
00242     linearLeastSquares(A, b, x);
00243 
00244     cout<<"linearLeastSquares_test() 1:"<<endl
00245         <<"\tA:"<<A<<endl
00246         <<"\tb:"<<b<<endl
00247         <<"\tx:"<<x<<endl;
00248 
00249 
00250     A.resize(4, 2);
00251     A(0,0) = 0; A(0, 1) = 1;
00252     A(1,0) = 2; A(1, 1) = 1;
00253     A(2,0) = 4; A(2, 1) = 1;
00254     A(3,0) = -1; A(3, 1) = 1;
00255 
00256     b.resize(4);
00257     b[0] = 3;
00258     b[1] = 3;
00259     b[2] = 4;
00260     b[3] = 2;
00261 
00262     x.resize(2);
00263     linearLeastSquares(A, b, x);
00264 
00265     cout<<"linearLeastSquares_test() 2:"<<endl
00266         <<"\tA:"<<A<<endl
00267         <<"\tb:"<<b<<endl
00268         <<"\tx:"<<x<<endl;
00269 
00270 
00271 }

00278 void UBlasExtras::svd(Matrix& A, Vector& s) {
00279 
00280 #if (HAVE_BOOST_SANDBOX && HAVE_CLAPACK)
00281 
00282 
00283     int const m = boost::numeric::bindings::traits::matrix_size1(A);
00284     int const n = boost::numeric::bindings::traits::matrix_size2(A);
00285     int const min_mn = std::min(m, n);
00286     
00287     // temporary storage
00288     Matrix at(A);
00289     Matrix u(m, min_mn); 
00290     u.clear();
00291     Matrix vt(min_mn, n); 
00292     vt.clear();
00293     s.resize(min_mn);
00294     
00295     // We do have column major matricies.
00296 
00297 
00298     // call SVD
00299     int info = boost::numeric::bindings::lapack::gesvd(at, s, u, vt);
00300     if (info != 0) throw std::runtime_error("failed in gesvd");
00301 #else
00302     throw std::runtime_error("SVD needs CLAPACK and BOOST_SANDBOX. Check makefiles.");
00303 #endif
00304 
00305 }

00308 
00315 size_t UBlasExtras::rank(Matrix& A) {
00316 
00317     Vector sv;
00318     size_t r=0;
00319     size_t s=0;
00320 
00321     svd(A, sv);
00322 
00323     while (s < sv.size() && sv[s++] > 1e-15) r++;
00324 
00325     return r;
00326         
00327 }

00329 
00335 Matrix& UBlasExtras::pseudoInverse(Matrix& A, Matrix& Ainv) {
00336 
00337 #if (HAVE_BOOST_SANDBOX && HAVE_CLAPACK)
00338 
00339 
00340     int const m = boost::numeric::bindings::traits::matrix_size1(A);
00341     int const n = boost::numeric::bindings::traits::matrix_size2(A);
00342     int const min_mn = std::min(m, n);
00343     
00344     // temporary storage
00345     Matrix at(A);
00346     Matrix u(m, min_mn); 
00347     u.clear();
00348     Matrix vt(min_mn, n); 
00349     vt.clear();
00350     Vector s(min_mn);
00351     s.clear();
00352 
00353     // We do have column major matricies.
00354 
00355 
00356     // call SVD
00357     int info = boost::numeric::bindings::lapack::gesvd(at, s, u, vt);
00358     if (info != 0) throw std::runtime_error("failed in gesvd");
00359 
00360     at.resize(min_mn, min_mn);
00361     at.clear();
00362     for (size_t sv=0; sv < s.size(); sv++) {
00363         if (s[sv] > 0.0) at(sv, sv) = 1.0/s[sv];
00364         else at(sv, sv)=0;
00365     }
00366 
00367     assert(Ainv.size1() == A.size2());
00368     assert(Ainv.size2() == A.size1());
00369     Matrix tmp(min_mn, m);
00370     noalias(tmp) = prod(at, trans(u));
00371     Ainv = prod(trans(vt), tmp);
00372 
00373 
00374 #else
00375     throw std::runtime_error("SVD needs CLAPACK and BOOST_SANDBOX. Check makefiles.");
00376 #endif
00377 
00378     return Ainv;
00379 
00380 }

00388 void UBlasExtras::solveLinearCholesky(Matrix& A, Vector& b, Vector& x) {
00389 
00390 #if (HAVE_BOOST_SANDBOX && HAVE_CLAPACK) 
00391     // temporary storage
00392 
00393     symmetric_adaptor<Matrix, lower> symA(A);
00394     Matrix bt(b.size(), 1);
00395     column(bt, 0).assign(b);
00396     // We do have column major matricies.
00397 
00398     // call Cholesky solve. Not sure why, but on OSX clapack (with
00399     // ATLAS BLAS) seems to beat ATLAS.
00400     int info = boost::numeric::bindings::lapack::posv(symA, bt);
00401     if (info != 0) throw std::runtime_error("failed in posv, Cholesky solve");
00402 
00403     noalias(x) = column(bt, 0);
00404 
00405 #else
00406     throw std::runtime_error("Cholesky solve needs CLAPACK. Check makefiles for -DHAVE_CLAPACK.");
00407 #endif
00408 
00409 }
